channel.title: Vue on Nekolas
channel.description: Recent content in Vue on Nekolas

item.title: Hugo | Creat a Gallery Page with Spolight Style
item.description: 1.Create a gallery page My goal is to build a galley sub page which can contain my photo works. The problem is that I don’t know how to use .md file to render these markups mixed with Vue scripts so that I had to put a raw .html file and then imported css stylesheet from my theme. Stacks: HTML CSS Vue.js 1.2 HTML They are simple markups: <div class="container"> <div class="wrapper"> <!
